inclusion.criterion: men being screened for prostate cancer in the project 'Prevention of Obesity-related Cancers'
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Screening naïve, defined as no blood taking for PSA within past 5 years AND no prostate biopsy within past 5 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree for non-contrast MRI scanning of prostate
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Men who are contraindicated for MRI(Pacemaker in-situ, Metallic implants which are not MRI-compatible, or Claustrophobia)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with a large prostate and bladder issues, suitable for urethral catheterization and TURP. Recent blood chemistry was normal.
